attributes.action: Use land of former Portland school for parks and sports grounds.
attributes.background: IPACA land will be sold off to housing developers in the future but this is not going to be affordable. The land should be used for recreation and sporting facilities, more housing will not be beneficial to local communities and merge villages together loosing their identities

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
